sourcesContent: import r,{useMemo as i}from"react";import a from"../utils/clsx";import t from"../utils/with-defaults";import e from"./grid-item";import{jsx as s}from"react/jsx-runtime";const c=r.forwardRef((({gap:r,wrap:t,css:c,children:o,className:n,...p},l)=>{const m=i((()=>`calc(${r} * $space$3)`),[r]);return s(e,{ref:l,className:a("nextui-grid-container",n),css:{$$gridGapUnit:m,display:"flex",flexWrap:t,boxSizing:"border-box",margin:"calc(-1 * $$gridGapUnit)",width:"calc(100% + $$gridGapUnit * 2)",...c},...p,children:o})}));c.displayName="NextUI.GridContainer",c.toString=()=>".nextui-grid-container";export default t(c,{gap:0,wrap:"wrap",className:""});
